verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: was] scheduled to meet with congressional Republicans on Tuesday as the controversy over the administration 's " zero tolerance " immigration policy continued to heat up . Trump and his supporters blame Democrats for not cutting an immigration deal with the GOP .
